Text: Seeing that this movie was never released on Blu-ray, thanks for this 720p tv-rip! It's way better than dvd.

Great quality! You just forgot to include subtitles on this one. Normally, it wouldn't be a problem, but this movie apparently doesn't have a FPS of 23.976 (or smth), because every subtitles gets more and more out of sync as the movie advances, so I can't find a right subtitle.
